content.raw:
I like the idea of additional tests and especially for subsegments.

I only have a few questions/comments:
- Is there output from the posterior task that we could baseline and test against as well?
- What version of GMTK are you using? Unlike some of the older tests it might be worthwhile for newer tests to mention exactly what version of external software you are using to make sure things are reproducible.
content.html:
I like the idea of additional tests and especially for subsegments.

I only have a few questions/comments: - Is there output from the posterior task that we could baseline and test against as well? - What version of GMTK are you using? Unlike some of the older tests it might be worthwhile for newer tests to mention exactly what version of external software you are using to make sure things are reproducible.
